show_name: Ebiten: Ebisugawa Public High School's Tenmonbu (TV)
other_title: えびてん 公立海老栖川高校天悶部 (Japanese)
plot: Noya Kazuki, a high school freshman, joins the astronomy club, which turns out to be more than just astronomy.
opening_theme: "Mirai-iro no Yakusoku" by Hoshi no Shoujo-tai
ending_theme: "Chikyuu ni I love you" by Asuka Nishi
"Delicate ni Suki Shite" by Nomizu Iori
"Ultraseven no Uta" by Tsukimiya Midori & Murai Hisako
"melos no you ni " by Asuka Nishi
"Ai wo Torimodose!!!" by Tsukimiya Midori & Murai Hisako
insert_song: "Ai wa Boomerang ~IZUMIKO PARADISE mix~" by Iori Nomizu
"Binta En'ento" (ビンタ・・・延々と) by Iori Nomizu
"Kōritsu Ebisugawa Kōkō Tenmon-Bu 2-nensei" (公立海老栖川西高校天悶部2年生) by Bibabiba Tenmon-bu
"Oshatō Fantasy" (お砂糖ファンタジー;Sugar Fantasy) by Kana Asumi
"Watashi Wadaare?" (わたしはだぁれ?) by Iori Nomizu
